title: COVID-19

title: Cancer
description: Cancer represents more than 200 different types of malignancies—diseases caused by the uncontrolled and destructive growth of cells.

description: Type 1 diabetes (T1D) is an autoimmune disease in which the body’s immune system attacks and destroys the beta cells

title: Lupus
description: Systemic lupus erythematosus (lupus) is a chronic, systemic autoimmune disease which can damage any part of the body, including the heart, joints

title: Allergies & Asthma
description: Allergies and asthma are immune mediated diseases that occur when the body's immune system overreacts to a foreign substance
